original: @49a # // rgya gar skad du /
analyzed: @49a # // rgya gar skad du /
translated: In Sanskrit:

original: k'a ru na ka p'a la tsarya: drishti n'a ma /
analyzed: k'a ru na ka p'a la tsarya: drishti n'a ma /
translated: Karunākapālaca-ryā-dṛṣṭi-nāma

original: bod skad du /
analyzed: bod skad du /
translated: In Tibetan:

original: snying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
analyzed: snying rje spyod pa thod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba /
translated: The View of the Skullcup Conduct of Compassion

original: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo //🔽nam mkhar gser gyi yu ba can //
analyzed: dpal bde mchog la phyag 'tshal lo // nam mkhar gser gyi yu ba can //
translated: Homage to glorious Cakrasaṃvara.🔽In the sky, holding above my head

original: gdugs steng mgo la 'dzin nas gnas //🔽rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs par mdzod //
analyzed: gdugs steng mgo la 'dzin nas gnas // rdo rje mkha' 'gro gshegs par mdzod //
translated: a golden parasol with a handle,🔽come, Vajraḍāka.

original: bha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
analyzed: bha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
translated: Son of the ḍākinī of the charnel ground,

original: ci phyir zhen de yi ni //
analyzed: ci phyir zhen de yi ni //
translated: why is it so?

original: drin gyis rnal 'byor bsam pa grub //
analyzed: drin gyis rnal 'byor bsam pa grub //
translated: Through your kindness, the yogi's wishes are fulfilled.

original: stong nyid kham phor lag tu thogs //
analyzed: stong nyid kham phor lag tu thogs //
translated: Grasping the bowl of emptiness in my hand,

original: thabs kyi khu bas bkang byas nas//
analyzed: thabs kyi khu bas bkang byas nas//
translated: filled with the juice of method,

original: sangs rgyas zhing du phyin te gnas //
analyzed: sangs rgyas zhing du phyin te gnas //
translated: I have arrived and dwell in the buddha realm.

original: srid gsum bcing ba rtsad nas bcad //
analyzed: srid gsum bcing ba rtsad nas bcad //
translated: The bonds of the three existences are completely severed.

original: mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rtag tu bsrungs //
analyzed: mkha' 'gro ma brgyad rtag tu bsrungs //
translated: The eight ḍākinīs always protect.

original: sgo bcu dag ni rgya yis btab //
analyzed: sgo bcu dag ni rgya yis btab //
translated: The ten doors are sealed.

original: dha ri ka ni smra bar byed //
analyzed: dha ri ka ni smra bar byed //
translated: Dhāri teaches.

original: kun la khyab kyang gcig gis ni //
analyzed: kun la khyab kyang gcig gis ni //
translated: Though pervading all, if one

original: de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na //
analyzed: de yi mtshan nyid rtog med na //
translated: does not conceive of its characteristics,

original: bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas //
analyzed: bdag gis ji ltar bstan par byas //
translated: I will teach it just as it was taught.

original: dha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
analyzed: dha ri mkha' 'gro ma yi sras //
translated: The son of the ḍākinī of the charnel ground,

original: ci phyir zhe na de yi ni //
analyzed: ci phyir zhe na de yi ni //
translated: Why is it so?

original: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur //
analyzed: bsam pa yid bzhin 'grub par 'gyur //
translated: Because his thoughts will be fulfilled.

original: snying rje thod pa spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dha ri ka pa nas brgyud pa slob dpon sar bha khas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
analyzed: snying rje thod pa spyod pa'i lta ba zhes bya ba slob dpon dha ri ka pa nas brgyud pa slob dpon sar bha khas mdzad pa rdzogs so//
translated: The View of the Skullcup of Compassion, composed by Master Sarvahaka, is complete.
